column2: Keep It Safe''' is the seventh track of disc one of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - The Complete Recordings]]'' by [[Howard Shore]].

column1: The Road goes ever on and on
Down from the door where it began.
Now far ahead the Road has gone
Hey ho! To the bottle I go
To heal my heart and drown my woe
Rain may fall and wind may blow
Sweet is the sound of the pouring rain
Better than rain or rippling brook
Is a mug of beer inside this Took
[[Category:The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - The Complete Recordings]]
